original_text: The king of Assyria took his army and he marched through all the land of Israel. He attacked Samaria. His army made their camp around the city for three years.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 올라와 그 온 땅에 두루다니고 사마리아로 올라와 그 곳을 삼 년간 에워쌌더라

sentences.original_text: The king of Assyria took his army
and he marched through all the land of Israel
His army made their camp around the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군대가 성 주위에 진지를 만들었으며
